item.title: Case Study: Rebuilding IT & Product Departments
item.description: Get it on This case study provides examples of my experience in rebuilding IT and product departments. The lessons learned include advice on identifying business domains and splitting teams, adjusting existing methodologies, identifying product streams, seeking external consultancy, prioritising people growth, and setting strategy.
